body_html:
Thanks for adding the gradients!

It looks like the lint is failing due to 4 space indentation and some other style issues. Checkout this section on how to run pylint locally so this PR can be reviewed and merged.
body_text:
Thanks for adding the gradients!
It looks like the lint is failing due to 4 space indentation and some other style issues. Checkout this section on how to run pylint locally so this PR can be reviewed and merged.
body:
Thanks for adding the gradients!

It looks like the lint is failing due to 4 space indentation and some other style issues. Checkout [this section](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#python-coding-style) on how to run `pylint` locally so this PR can be reviewed and merged.
